verses.verse: O give thanks <S%H3034><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; for he is good <S%H2896><s%>: because his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
Let Israel <S%H3478><s%> now say <S%H559><s%>, that his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
Let the house <S%H1004><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> now say <S%H559><s%>, that his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
Let them now that fear <S%H3373><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> say <S%H559><s%>, that his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>.

I called <S%H7121><s%> upon the LORD <S%H3050><s%> in distress <S%H4712><s%>: the LORD <S%H3050><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> me, and set me in a large place <S%H4800><s%>. in distress: Heb. out of distress
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is on my side; I will not fear <S%H3372><s%>: what can <S%H6213><s%> man <S%H120><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> unto me? on: Heb. for me
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> taketh my part with them that help <S%H5826><s%> me: therefore shall I see <S%H7200><s%> my desire upon them that hate <S%H8130><s%> me.
It is better <S%H2896><s%> to trust <S%H2620><s%> in the LORD <S%H3068><s%> than to put confidence <S%H982><s%> in man <S%H120><s%>.
It is better <S%H2896><s%> to trust <S%H2620><s%> in the LORD <S%H3068><s%> than to put confidence <S%H982><s%> in princes <S%H5081><s%>.
All nations <S%H1471><s%> compassed me about <S%H5437><s%>: but in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will I destroy <S%H4135><s%> them. destroy: Heb. cut them off
They compassed me about <S%H5437><s%>; yea, they compassed me about <S%H5437><s%>: but in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> I will destroy <S%H4135><s%> them.

They compassed me about <S%H5437><s%> like bees <S%H1682><s%>; they are quenched <S%H1846><s%> as the fire <S%H784><s%> of thorns <S%H6975><s%>: for in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> I will destroy <S%H4135><s%> them. destroy: Heb. cut down
Thou hast thrust <S%H1760><s%> sore <S%H1760><s%> at me that I might fall <S%H5307><s%>: but the LORD <S%H3068><s%> helped <S%H5826><s%> me.
The LORD <S%H3050><s%> is my strength <S%H5797><s%> and song <S%H2176><s%>, and is become my salvation <S%H3444><s%>.

The voice <S%H6963><s%> of rejoicing <S%H7440><s%> and salvation <S%H3444><s%> is in the tabernacles <S%H168><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%>: the right hand <S%H3225><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> doeth <S%H6213><s%> valiantly <S%H2428><s%>.
The right hand <S%H3225><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is exalted <S%H7426><s%>: the right hand <S%H3225><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> doeth <S%H6213><s%> valiantly <S%H2428><s%>.
I shall not die <S%H4191><s%>, but live <S%H2421><s%>, and declare <S%H5608><s%> the works <S%H4639><s%> of the LORD <S%H3050><s%>.
The LORD <S%H3050><s%> hath chastened <S%H3256><s%> me sore <S%H3256><s%>: but he hath not given me over <S%H5414><s%> unto death <S%H4194><s%>.
Open <S%H6605><s%> to me the gates <S%H8179><s%> of righteousness <S%H6664><s%>: I will go <S%H935><s%> into them, and I will praise <S%H3034><s%> the LORD <S%H3050><s%>:
This gate <S%H8179><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, into which the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall enter <S%H935><s%>.
I will praise <S%H3034><s%> thee: for thou hast heard <S%H6030><s%> me, and art become my salvation <S%H3444><s%>.
The stone <S%H68><s%> which the builders <S%H1129><s%> refused <S%H3988><s%> is become the head <S%H7218><s%> stone of the corner <S%H6438><s%>.
This is the LORD'S <S%H3068><s%> doing; it is marvellous <S%H6381><s%> in our eyes <S%H5869><s%>. the LORD's: Heb. from the LORD
This is the day <S%H3117><s%> which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath made <S%H6213><s%>; we will rejoice <S%H1523><s%> and be glad <S%H8055><s%> in it.
Save <S%H3467><s%> now, I beseech <S%H577><s%> thee, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>: O LORD <S%H3068><s%>, I beseech <S%H577><s%> thee, send now prosperity <S%H6743><s%>.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be he that cometh <S%H935><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: we have blessed <S%H1288><s%> you out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

God <S%H410><s%> is the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, which hath shewed us light <S%H215><s%>: bind <S%H631><s%> the sacrifice <S%H2282><s%> with cords <S%H5688><s%>, even unto the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>.
Thou art my God <S%H410><s%>, and I will praise <S%H3034><s%> thee: thou art my God <S%H430><s%>, I will exalt <S%H7311><s%> thee.
O give thanks <S%H3034><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; for he is good <S%H2896><s%>: for his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
